neighbors.name: Todd A. Gladfelter and Karen Gladfelter
neighbors.claims: Todd A. Gladfelter and Karen Gladfelter are listed as owners of a property at 473 Michelle Drive in the Potomac District of Berkeley County (PIN 02-9G0018-0000-0000) ([Redfin](https://www.redfin.com/WV/Hedgesville/473-Michelle-Dr-25427/home/15850558)). Karen Gladfelter (age 66) is recorded as a resident of Hedgesville, WV ([NationalPublicData](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/g/karen-gladfelter/)). The property is situated in a rural subdivision of ~1-acre residential lots ([Redfin](https://www.redfin.com/WV/Hedgesville/473-Michelle-Dr-25427/home/15850558)). No references to either Todd or Karen Gladfelter engaging in local government meetings or public commentary on development were found in available Berkeley County Planning Commission records ([Berkeley County](https://berkeleywv.org/AgendaCenter/ViewFile/Minutes/_12022024-1101)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Private residents; no public offices found

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach the Gladfelters in a neighborly, face-to-face manner. Emphasize maintaining the quiet rural character of the area and reassure them that their property values and privacy will be respected.

neighbors.name: Jamie G. Roseman and Dianna L. Roseman
neighbors.claims: Jamie G. Roseman and Dianna L. Roseman reside on Michelle Drive in Hedgesville, WV ([Dignity Memorial](https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/martinsburg-wv/clay-elliott-10886643)). Jamie Roseman has been active in the local community, volunteering with the Berkeley County Youth Fair and the Hedgesville Little League Baseball Field ([Dignity Memorial](https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/martinsburg-wv/clay-elliott-10886643)). He is also a long-time member of a hunting club in nearby Romney, WV ([Dignity Memorial](https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/martinsburg-wv/clay-elliott-10886643)). No record of the Rosemans participating in recent Berkeley County Planning Commission hearings on development issues was found ([Berkeley County](https://www.berkeleywv.org/AgendaCenter/PreviousVersions/_03042024-839)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Active volunteer in youth sports and county fair

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage Mr. Roseman with a friendly visit, acknowledging his community service with the Youth Fair and Little League. Discuss how the project aligns with local interests and wildlife preservation, given his outdoor background.

neighbors.name: Scott Michael Shimel
neighbors.claims: Scott Michael Shimel is the owner of a property at 506 Michelle Drive in Hedgesville, WV (PIN 02-9G0020-0000-0000) ([Redfin](https://www.redfin.com/WV/Hedgesville/506-Michelle-Dr-25427/home/15850556)). Public records indicate he is 42 years old ([NationalPublicData](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/s/scott-shimel/)). In August 2022, a Scott Shimel was named General Manager for BlackHawk Industrial in Southern California, having spent over 20 years in the industrial distribution industry in that region ([Industrial Supply Magazine](https://industrialsupplymagazine.com/pages/News-080822-BlackHawk-Industrial-hires-industry-veteran-Shimel.php)). It is unclear if he resides full-time in Berkeley County. No public statements on local development projects were found in Berkeley County records ([Berkeley County](https://www.berkeleywv.org/AgendaCenter/ViewFile/Minutes/_03172025-1199)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Industry professional; unclear local residency status

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out to Mr. Shimel to introduce the project. Given his industrial business background, he may appreciate a straightforward, data-driven discussion about the project's economic and operational details.

citations.claim: Named General Manager for BlackHawk Industrial in Southern California
citations.title: BlackHawk Industrial hires industry veteran Shimel

citations.claim: No public statements in Berkeley County records
citations.title: Berkeley County Planning Commission Minutes

neighbors.name: Tyler James Cloud and Jacob Ashby Cloud
neighbors.claims: Tyler James Cloud and Jacob Ashby Cloud are identified as the grandchildren of the late Janice Thomas Cloud, a long-time resident of Hedgesville, WV ([Brown Funeral Homes](https://www.brownfuneralhomeswv.com/memorials/Cloud-Janice/1357736/help)). The draft profile associated them with PIN 02-9000-1000-4000; however, county records indicate this PIN corresponds to a property in Jefferson County (Charles Town), not Berkeley County ([Charles Town Annexation Application](https://cms2.revize.com/revize/charlestownwv/Documents/Government/Plans%20and%20Proposals/Application_Submitted_to_County_Commission.pdf)). Consequently, their specific land ownership in Berkeley County could not be verified in this audit. There is no indication that Tyler or Jacob Cloud have publicly expressed views on land development in Berkeley County ([Berkeley County](https://www.berkeleywv.org/554/Planning)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Local family ties; no public profile found

approach_recommendations.engage: Contact the Cloud brothers via a friendly introduction to clarify their property interest in the project area. Highlight opportunities for young residents and respect for their family's long-standing ties to the Hedgesville community.

citations.claim: Grandchildren of Janice Thomas Cloud of Hedgesville

neighbors.name: Michael D. Writt
neighbors.claims: Michael D. Writt is the listed owner of a Potomac District parcel in Berkeley County (PIN 02-9G0017-0000-0000), located in the Michelle Drive subdivision near other verified profiles ([Redfin](https://www.redfin.com/WV/Hedgesville/473-Michelle-Dr-25427/home/15850558)). The Writt surname is associated with local families in the region, though specific connection to the Shepherdstown farm family could not be independently re-verified in this audit. Michael D. Writt has no recorded involvement in county boards or public comments on development in available online records ([Berkeley County](https://www.berkeleywv.org/AgendaCenter/ViewFile/Minutes/_12022024-1101)).
neighbors.influence_justification: No public role or visibility found

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a respectful conversation with Mr. Writt through a familiar community channel. Emphasize how the project can co-exist with the residential character of the Michelle Drive neighborhood.
